page.title: 06WEST CUMBERLAND HOSPITAL.
page.content: West cumberland Hospital is a District General Hospital for Cumbria.Although there are 500 beds it caters for 139000 people.Miss Grosvenor is the Senior Nursing Officer.She knows her way around the hospital.There are 18 wards & a clinic.These include general medicine,surgical,orthopaedics,childre n's,mental illness,geriatrics, eyes, maternity,accident & emergency,X-rays, pathology lab & phisiotherapy.The nurses wear different coloured belts deep purple_mid wives,red_staff pink_nursery nurses,orange_student, green_enrolled nurses and yellow for pupil nurses.There are a 1000 staff in the hospital-450 are nurses &the remainder are office staff & ancillary workers.A helicopter fom R.A.F Boulmer is used to ferry people suffering from serious head injuries to hosptal in Newcastle.(cost-Â£12000)
